lastfm.summary: In this song Dion is warning Flo, Jane and Mary to stay clear of The Wanderer. Dion told Rolling Stone magazine in 1976: "You say to a chick, 'Stay away from that guy. And she would say, 'What guy?' Chicks loved a rebel." (Source The Wanderer Songfacts) Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: The Wanderer
